title: Strengthening Software Development Practical Competencies: Social Presence Enhancement Strategies for Virtual Human Resource Development

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can apply three indicators (trust, communication, collaboration) to measure social presence in virtual environments.
Learners can design online activities that enhance social presence using the Genie 9-Stage Instructional Design Model.
Learners can establish practical strategies to improve virtual team learning outcomes by 20% using the Community of Inquiry (CoI) framework.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
